about_the_game:
Hello! Bonjour! Ciao! Hola! Hérete! Buna ziua!

The Ticket to Ride Europe Expansion will take you from coast to coast on land and sea as you build your travel network! Tunnel through the Alps, claim ferry routes across the Mediterranean, and complete tickets from Portugal to Poland!

Plus, when you buy the Europe Expansion, you’ll get the Europa 1912 Ticket Pack too! This special bonus content includes three new game modes and even more new tickets to complete. The Europa 1912 Ticket Pack adds even more ways to play the Europe Expansion, bringing your adventures from past to present and back again. You’ll be forging the history of your railway empire in no time!

INCLUDES:

TWO NEW CHARACTERS – Play as Erika Ford, a young businesswoman with a vision and the brains to make it happen, and Bertie Hawkes, a friendly smooth-talking salesman, loving life from city to city!

TWO NEW TRAINS – Cross the continent with the sturdy and reliable Dolomite Dynamite, and stay at the cutting-edge of steam train technology with the Rocket!

TWO NEW CARRIAGES – The Lumberjack and the Oil Baron. Timber travels best on the railway, and with your sturdy oil tanker, you’ll keep the lamps burning wherever you go!

It’s time to take your railway network international!
